title.rendered: STEDI HEAVY DUTY MINING & INDUSTRIAL 150W LED FLOOD LIGHT

content.rendered:
The new STEDI Mine Spec range is specifically engineered for the heavy industrial market. Application for our 150W Heavy include Mobile light towers, Heavy Vehicle lighting, work shop lighting, Drill Rig lighting.

MINE SPEC WIDE FLOOD

EXTRAORDINARY BRIGHTNESS

DURABLE

Coming Soon.

PERFORMANCE

Coming Soon.

BEAM CHARACTERISTICS

Coming Soon.

DETAILS

The new STEDI Mine Spec range is specifically engineered for the heavy industrial market. Application for our 150W Heavy include Mobile light towers, Heavy Vehicle lighting, work shop lighting, Drill Rig lighting.

MATERIAL

  • 6063 Extruded Aluminium CAE optimized heat-sink
  • Ultra efficient reflectors form smooth flood beam free of artifacts.
  • Unbreakable Lexan Polycarbonate PC len.
  • 4.5mm thick Stainless Steel Bracket
  • Anodized polyester UV stable powder coat

PROTECTED AGAINST 

  • Reverse Polarity
  • Shock-proof, IP68 Waterproof, and dust proof.
  • RFI/EMC
  • Over & Under Voltage protection

FEATURES 

  • PWM Thermal Management Regulations
  • 50,000 Hours operating life
  • Gore-Tex Breather Vent

SPECIFICATIONS

POWER 150W
LED 30 x 5W LED
CURRENT DRAW 10.4A @ 13.2v, 4.5A @ 24v
VOLTAGE 9 to 36v
RAW LUMENS 15,000Lm
INGRESS PROTECTION IP68
COLOUR TEMP 6000K
LIFESPAN 50,000hrs
LENS Harden Optical PC
WEIGHT 5.350kg
OPERATING TEMP  – 40 to +60 °C
HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium Alloy with Polyester UV Powder Coat
DIMENSIONS EXCLUDING BRACKET (W) 285mm x (D)130mm (H) 220mm

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 150W Mine Spec Flood LED Light

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
